title: Sticky honey and sesame stir-fried beef with herb salad

For the stir-fry beef: 150g/5½oz Organic Welsh black beef steak, cut into strips
For the herb salad: large handful fresh flat leaf parsley
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 lime, cut into wedges, for garnish

steps: For the beef, place the strips of beef into a small bowl, add the chilli flakes, sesame seeds, vegetable oil, Worchestershire sauce, crushed coriander seeds and honey, stir well and leave to marinate for five minutes.
Heat a griddle pan until smoking hot, add the beef strips and griddle for 1-2 minutes.
For the herb salad, mix the coriander leaves, parsley leaves, lemon juice, lime juice, olive oil and seasoning together in a large bowl.
To serve, pile the herb salad onto a serving plate and top with the griddled beef. Place the lime wedges alongside.
